## Test Valid External Links

[valid external link](http://example.org)
[valid external link with title](http://example.org "example title")
[valid external link with alt|example alt](http://example.org)
[valid external link with alt and title|example alt](http://example.org "example title")

## Test Valid Mailto

[valid mailto](mailto:admin@example.org)

## Test Valid Image URLs

![valid image](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Example.jpg)
![valid image with title](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Example.jpg "example image title")
![valid image with alt|example image alt](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Example.jpg)
![valid image with alt and title|example image alt](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Example.jpg "example image title")

## Test Invalid

[invalid link](http://invalid.example.org)
[invalid relative link](/invalid)
